title: A Mao Gushi
synopsis: Ah Mao is a clever, naughty, and imaginative child. He has a group of little friends who are also only children-his "follower" Xiaopi, the quiet Lanlan, the greedy and show-off fat beans, the overbearing tank, and two little pets-beautiful, elegant, The arrogant little white cat Snowball and funny-looking but faithful, good-tempered puppy hairballs. He also has two toy partners-arrogant, nasty-minded weird gowns and playful, boastful but very sincere thorn balls to Amao. When there are no outsiders, these two toys will "survive" ", play with Amao. (translated from iqiyi)
